short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A suit of Salesforce tools to improve you productivity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome Extension hosts a suit of Salesforce productivity tools which helps developers and admins to improve the efficiency of their tasks.

The current release contains a test class coverage tool which gives a 360 degree view of apex coverage in our Salesforce instance.

Users can download the coverage details as a CSV with class names and respective coverage.
